# Navigation Flow

> Auto-generated by code_context. Last updated: 2026-01-12T19:14:56.362077

Screen-to-screen navigation structure of the application.

## Navigation Storyboard

7 screens, 11 navigation edges
Router: goRouter
Entry: HomePage

### Graph

HomePage
  --> SettingsPage (/settings)
      trigger: HomePage → onPressed
  --> ProfilePage (/profile)
      trigger: HomePage → builder → onTap

LoginPage
  --> HomePage (/home)
      trigger: _LoginPageState → _handleLogin → if(success && mounted)
  --> SignupPage (/signup)
      trigger: _LoginPageState → _navigateToSignup

ProductListPage
  --> HomePage (/home)
      trigger: _ProductListPageState → onPressed

ProfilePage
  --> SettingsPage (/settings)
      trigger: ProfilePage → onPressed

SettingsPage
  --> HomePage (/home)
      trigger: SettingsPage → onPressed
  --> ProfilePage (/profile)
      trigger: SettingsPage → onTap
  --> LoginPage (/login)
      trigger: SettingsPage → onTap → if(context.mounted)

SignupPage
  --> HomePage (/home)
      trigger: _SignupPageState → _handleSignup → if(success && mounted)
  --> LoginPage (/login)
      trigger: _SignupPageState → _navigateToLogin
